response.overview: A Precious Hotel in the woods, where Japanese soldiers, yangbans, sangnomists, pro-Japanese, and independents come to visit.  The hotel's owner, Mi-hwa, saves her Shin-ae and Yeon-hwa's lives, allowing them to stay at her hotel and do her job.  She takes revenge on Seong-gyu for taking her child's life. First, she serves Sung-gyu with all her heart.  One day, Go Kyung-jin visits a hotel, and Yeon-hwa seems to know him.  Mihwa, who sleeps with all the men and saves money.  What is the purpose of the women in the hotel?
response.title: War of the Seeds
